title: Does anyone know any information on NA LCS Finals tickets?
body:
About to buy my plane ticket, but I would like to make sure I have tickets to the event first.

Meow

replies.body: Just posted this just before the article went live!  In case you haven't seen it: http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/how-get-your-na-lcs-spring-finals-tickets
Thanks Tiza! Do you know of any kind of room discount for buying tickets at Mandalay?
